1093129248364249088.text: Word to the wise, don't put your production k8s clusters on the Internet. 1) you expose info. about your internal IP setup, 2) there is *no* cert. revocation, so anyone who ever saw a client cert. can still get access 3) This setup has a FUT of one.pic.twitter.com/zCqe979xN2

1117880771853864962.text:
Testing on range:
Aimed to feel like I'm reducing my ball speed down to 80% of my regular full shot swing using shot tracer technology. 

Testing on course: 
Feels like a significant difference in quality of strike with improved flight patterns. Windy conditions.

1114253641035255808.text:
The mysteries of curl. 

What worked for me last week. Did not work this week. 

export https_proxy=ipaddress:port 
curl --insecure targeturl

Did the trick to save me building a postman or making manual requests.

1112839612668526592.text: Really good few holes this evening in fairly tough conditions playing to 1 over handicap for the selected holes. Working on pre/post shot routine and developing my target perception.

1109592974697082880.text: Golf season off to a great start. 1 shot reduction and first win under my belt.

1104111356725342208.text: Glad to be home again after a week away doing a spot of attacking a modern network with a couple of top technically talented individuals and helping close down some significant defects. Now time for more game of thrones catchup! #teamscotland #careers #infosec @NCCGroupCareers

1101921790329266176.text: So as well as the fun of the bike tour. We met the @GoT_direwolves before speeding back to the airport. Now to get through security and hopefully catch the plane home to Glasgow

1101869579096281088.text: Last day in northern Ireland spent on a game of thrones cycle tour in the rain. Awesome fun!

1100672587028410368.text: Very poor stuff from @GLA_Airport fire alarm ringing constantly for approximately 10 minutes this morning in gate area. Staff no clue what's going on, no explanation given either.

1100512897543925761.text: Today I was humbled by the feedback and comments from the attendees of the hands on web app hacking course. I was also greatly inspired. #infosec #qatesters #developers #devops in the same room. #learning

1099068369100308482.text: After a day of reporting, studying, travelling most of the country for my 3 yearly pilgrimage.  So great to end the weekend again out teaching about hands on web app testing techniques to developers and QA testers. Shame about my cold :-)pic.twitter.com/ABzLuxly8U

1017897780600279042.text: The white box hardware hacking workshop was really interesting & informative.Watching our global team members then pluck away at finding/discussing vulnerable C was frankly awesome.  #NCCCon18

1015330387650928641.text: From reading books on physical security to firewall configuration & cis documentation to finishing of with IDA pro. Busy week!

1014663804620328960.text: Went to this vegan restaurant last night https://www.facebook.com/lotusveget/  very impressed with the food selection and hospitality

1013115054768697344.text: Two days of thunderstorms great for catching up on some reading

1008028977833881601.text: Unfortunately competition called off due unplayable greens in the rain. Was 3 over through 7 and going strong as I chase down 10.

1005498971920445442.text: Another win today with 4 under c.s.s brings my handicap down to 11. Well on my way to my target for the season!

1004052717738840065.text: It's the great views that make me happy to travel up and down the country by trainpic.twitter.com/XFxgBmkfJR

1003720306077429761.text: Two hotels in a row where they have not presented me with an option to opt-out of marketing at the check in desk. GDPR adoption is going well I see.

1002952466416177154.text: I'm happy with my 4 under c.s.s score today, winning the monthly medal. New handicap 11.8 and won 4 closest to the holes!

1002561190449569794.text: Lots of good stuff here for small businesses https://www.ncsc.gov.uk/smallbusiness  #infosec #Cybersecurity

1002282214321721345.text: A mixed up day of messing with call scammers, web app hacking & reporting, black team OSINT, lock picking practice, putting & bunker  practice and now Oasis tribute bands with a pint of blue moon. #allinadayswork

1002147539565580290.text: Had yet another scam call. Begins with Aimee from "direct line" about my "accident" wanting to give me my compensation from 3rd party, a few answers they want to hear and call switches to David, who when I asked "so your from Admiral, yes?" ... "Yes sir, exactly!"

1001758912687804417.text: Hmrc phone scams doing the rounds I see. "call us back or face the consequences"

1001032942787944451.text: Had a fantastic night in London at Game of Thrones live concert.  @Djawadi_Ramin was superb! Now on my way back to Glasgow.

991734800452149253.text: As another web app/api testing project comes to an end, I am leaving inspired to learn even more & thankful for the fantastic help & participation from the members of the dev-op team. That's what I call "work".

991449342690185216.text: Great day working with the client today. Demonstrated how to setup a local browser proxy so they can repeat test cases more easily.

991073923591737344.text: It sure makes it much easier when you land the  ball close to the pin. Placed a 51 yard 54° wedge shot to under 2 feet on the last hole at the weekend to sneak 3rd place.

991050326731034624.text: Great day constructing access control test scenarios and working through the test cases. 4 bugs found and on their way to being fixed.
